alert.note: Alert for Cherry; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 8:25PM CDT until May 30 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Cherry County in north central Nebraska... East central Sheridan County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 830 PM MDT. * At 725 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Merriman to 27 miles north of Ashby, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cody, Merriman, Nenzel, Medicine Lake, Highway 61 crossing the Snake River, Eli, Morgan Lake, Billys Lake, Irwin, Schoolhouse Lake, Highway 27 crossing the Niobrara River, Rock Hill, Bayonne, and Indian Hill. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 110 and 168. Highway 61 between mile markers 193 and 231. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
